Lucian Works
with an English Translation by A. M. Harmon
Cambridge, MA Harvard University Press London William Heinemann Ltd. 1921

sp.speaker: *zeu/s
sp.p:
*(ermh=, labw
 touti\ to\ mh=lon a)/piqi ei)s th
 *frugi/an para\ to
 *pria/mou pai=da to
 bouko/lon — ne/mei de\ th=s *)/idhs e)n tw=| *garga/rw| — kai\ le/ge pro\s au)to/n, o(/ti se/, w)= *pa/ri, keleu/ei o( *zeu/s, e)peidh\ kalo/s te au)to\s ei)= kai\ sofo\s ta\ e)rwtika/, dika/sai tai=s qeai=s, h(/tis au)tw=n h( kalli/sth e)sti
 tou= de\ a)gw=nos to\ a)=qlon h( nikw=sa labe/tw to\ mh=lon. w(/ra de\ h)/dh kai\ u(mi=n au)tai=s a)pie/nai para\ to
 dikasth
 e)gw\ ga a)pwqou=mai th
 di/aitan e)p' i)/shs te u(ma=s a)gapw=n, kai\ ei)/ ge oi(=o
 te h)=n, h(de/ws a)
 a(pa/sas nenikhkui/as i)dw/n. a)/llws te kai\ a)na/gkh, mia=| to\ kallistei=on a)podo/nta pa/ntws a)pexqa/nesqai tai=s plei/osin. dia\ tau=ta au)to\s me
 ou)k e)pith/deios u(mi=n dikasth/s, o( de\ neani/as ou(=tos o( *fru\c e)f' o(
 a)/pite basiliko\s me/n e)sti kai\ *ganumh/dous toutoui\ suggenh/s, ta\ a)/lla de\ a)felh\s kai\ o)/reios, kou)k a)/n tis au)to
 a)paciw/seie toiau/ths qe/as.

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p:
e)gw\ me/n, w)= *zeu=, ei) kai\ to
 *mw=mon au)to
 e)pisth/seias h(mi=n dikasth/n, qarrou=sa badiou=mai pro\s th
 e)pi/deicin ti/ ga a)
 kai\ mwmh/saito/ mou; xrh\ de\ kai\ tau/tais a)re/skein to
 a)/nqrwpon. e)rasqh=|s — end.

sp.speaker: *(/hra
sp.p:
ou)d' h(mei=s, w)= *)afrodi/th, de/dimen, ou)d' a)
 o( *)/arhs o( so\s e)pitraph=| th
 di/aitan: a)lla\ dexo/meqa kai\ tou=ton, o(/stis a)
 h)=|, to
 *pa/rin.

sp.speaker: *zeu/s
sp.p: h)= kai\ soi\ tau=ta, w)= qu/gater, sundokei=; ti/ fh/s; a)postre/fh| kai\ e)ruqria=|s; e)/sti me\n i)/dion to\ ai)dei=sqai ta\ toiau=ta u(mw=n tw=n parqe/nwn e)pineu/eis d' o(/mws. a)/pite ou)=n kai\ mh\ xaleph/nhte tw=| dikasth=| ai( nenikhme/nai mhde\ kako\n e)ntri/yhsqe tw=| neani/skw|: ou) ga\r oi(=o/n te e)p' i)/shs pa/sas ei)=nai kala/s.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
proi+/wmen eu)qu\ th=s *frugi/as, e)gw\ me
 h(gou/menos, u(mei=s de\ mh\ brade/ws a)kolouqei=te/ moi kai\ qarrei=te. oi)=da e)gw\ to
 *pa/rin. neani/as e)sti\ kalo\s kai\ ta)/lla e)rwtiko\s kai\ ta\ toiau=ta kri/nein i(kanw/tatos. ou)k a)
 e)kei=nos dika/seien kakw=s.

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
*(ermh=s
sp.p: ou) pantelw=s a)/gamos, w)= *)afrodi/th.

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p: pw=s le/geis;

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: dokei= tis au)tw=| sunoikei=n *)idai/a gunh/, i(kanh\ me/n, a)groi=kos de\ kai\ deinw=s o)/reios, a)ll' ou) sfo/dra prose/xein au)th=| e)/oike. ti/nos d' ou)=n e(/neka tau=ta e)rwta=|s;

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p: a)/llws h)ro/mhn.

sp.speaker: *)aqh/na
sp.p: parapresbeu/eis, w)= ou(=tos, i)di/a| pa/lai tau/th| koinologou/menos

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: . ou)de/n , w)= *)aqhna=, deino\n ou)de\ kaq' u(mw=n, a)ll' h)/reto/ me ei) a)/gamos o( *pa/ris e)sti/n.

sp.speaker: *)aqh/na
sp.p: w(s dh\ ti/ tou=to polupragmonou=sa;

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: ou)k oi)=da: fhsi\ d' ou)=n o(/ti a)/llws e)pelqo/n, ou)k e)cepi/thdes h)/reto,

sp.speaker: *)aqh/na
sp.p: ti/ ou)=n; a)/gamo/s e)stin;

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: ou) dokei=.

sp.speaker: *)aqh/na
sp.p: ti/ de/; tw=n polemikw=n e)stin au)tw=| e)piqumi/a kai\ filo/doco/s tis, h)\ to\ pa=n bouko/los;

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
to\ me
 a)lhqe\s ou)k e)/xw ei)pei=n, ei)ka/zein de\ xrh\ ne/on o)/nta kai\ tou/twn o)re/gesqai tuxei=n kai\ bou/lesqai a)
 prw=ton au)to
 ei)=nai kata\ ta\s ma/xas.

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p: o(ra=|s, ou)de\n e)gw\ me/mfomai ou)de\ e)gkalw= soi to\ pro\s tau/thn i)di/a| lalei=n memyimoi/rwn ga\r kai\ ou)k *)afrodi/ths ta\ toiau=ta,

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
kai\ au(/th sxedo
 ta\ au)ta/ me h)/reto: dio\ mh\ xalepw=s e)/xe mhd' oi)/ou meionektei=n, ei)/ ti kai\ tau/th| kata\ to\ a(plou=n a)pekrina/mhn. a)lla\ metacu\ lo/gwn h)/dh polu\ proi+o/ntes a)pespa/samen tw=n a)ste/rwn kai\ sxedo/n ge kata\ th
 *frugi/an e)sme/n.. e)gw\ de\ kai\ th
 *)/idhn o(rw= kai\ to\ *ga/rgaron o(/lon a)kribw=s, ei) de\ mh\ e)capatw=mai, kai\ au)to
 u(mw=n to
 dikasth
 to
 *pa/rin.

sp.speaker: *(/hra
sp.p: pou= de/ e)stin; ou) ga\r ka)moi\ fai/netai.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: tau/th|, w)= *(/hra, pro\s ta\ laia\ perisko/pei, mh\ pro\s a)/krw| tw=| o)/rei, para\ de\ th\n pleura/n, ou(= to\ a)/ntron, e)/nqa kai\ th\n a)ge/lhn o(ra=|s.

sp.speaker: *(/hra
sp.p: a)ll' ou)x o(rw= th\n a)ge/lhn.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
*(/hra
sp.p: o(rw= nu=n, ei)/ ge e)kei=no/s e)stin.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: a)lla\ e)kei=nos. e)peidh\ de\ plhsi/on h)/dh e)sme/n, e)pi\ th=s gh=s, ei) dokei=, katasta/ntes badi/zwmen, i(/na mh\ diatara/cwmen au)to\n a)/nwqen e)c a)fanou=s kaqipta/menoi

sp.speaker: *(/hra
sp.p: eu)= le/geis, kai\ ou(/tw poiw=men. e)pei\ de\ katabebh/kamen, w(/ra soi, w)= *)afrodi/th, proi+e/nai kai\ h(gei=sqai h(mi=n th=s o(dou=: su\ ga\r w(s to\ ei)ko\s e)/mpeiros ei)= tou= xwri/ou polla/kis, w(s lo/gos, katelqou=sa pro\s *)agxi/shn.

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p: ou) sfo/dra, w)= *(/hra, tou/tois a)/xqomai toi=s skw/mmasin.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
a)ll' ou)=n e)gw\ u(mi=n h(gh/somai: kai\ ga au)to\s e)ndie/triya th=| *)/idh|, o(po/te dh\ o( *zeu\s h)/ra tou= meiraki/ou tou= *frugo/s, kai\ polla/kis deu=ro h)=lqon u(p' e)kei/nou katapemfqei\s ei)s e)piskoph
 tou= paido/s. kai\ o(po/te ge h)/dh e)n tw=| a)etw=| h)=n, sumparipta/mhn au)tw=| kai\ sunekou/fizon to
 kalo/n, kai\ ei)/ ge me/mnhmai, a)po\ tauthsi\ th=s pe/tras au)to
 a)nh/rpasen. o( me
 ga e)/tuxe to/te suri/zwn pro\s to\ poi/mnion, katapta/menos de\ o)/pisqen au)tou= o( *zeu\s kou/fws ma/la toi=s o)/nuci peribalw
 kai\ tw=| sto/mati th
 e)pi\ th=| kefalh=| tia/ran e)/xwn a)ne/fere to
 pai=da tetaragme/non kai\ tw=| traxh/lw| a)pestramme/nw| ei)s au)to
 a)poble/ponta. to/te ou)=n e)gw\ th
 su/rigga labw/n, a)pobeblh/kei ga au)th
 u(po\ tou= de/ous — a)lla\ ga o( diaithth\s ou(tosi\
plhsi/on, w(/ste prosei/pwmen au)to/n. xai=re, w)= bouko/le.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p: nh\ kai\ su/ ge, w)= neani/ske. ti/s d' w)\n deu=ro a)fi=cai pro\s h(ma=s; h)\ ti/nas tau/tas a)/geis ta\s gunai=kas; ou) ga\r e)pith/deiai o)reopolei=n, ou(/tws ge ou)=sai kalai/.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
a)ll' ou) gunai=ke\s ei)sin,*(/hran de/, w)= *pa/ri, kai\ *)aqhna=n kai\ *)afrodi/thn o(ra=|s: ka)me\ to
 *(ermh=n a)pe/steilen o( *zeu\s — a)lla\ ti/ tre/meis kai\ w)xria=|s; mh\ de/diqi: xalepo
 ga ou)de/n. keleu/ei de/ se dikasth
 gene/sqai tou= ka/llous au)tw=n e)pei\ ga/r, fhsi/, kalo/s te au)to\s ei)= kai\ sofo\s ta\ e)rwtika/, soi\ th
 gnw=sin e)pitre/pw. tou= de\ a)gw=nos to\ a)=qlon ei)/sh| a)nagnou\s to\ mh=lon.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p:
fe/r' i)/dw ti/ kai\ bou/letai. h( kalh/, fhsi/n, labe/tw. pw=s a)
 ou)=n, w)= de/spota *(ermh=, dunhqei/hn e)gw\ qnhto\s au)to\s kai\ a)groi=kos w)
 dikasth\s gene/sqai parado/cou qe/as kai\ mei/zonos h)\ kata\ bouko/lon; ta\ ga toiau=ta kri/nein tw=n a(brw=n ma=llon kai\ a)stikw=n to\ de\ e)mo/n, ai)=ga me
 ai)go\s o(pote/ra h( ^ kalli/wn kai\ da/malin a)/llhs dama/lews,

ta/x' a)
 dika/saimi kata\ th
 te/xnhn au(=tai de\ pa=sai/ te o(moi/ws kalai\ kai\ ou)k oi)=d' o(/pws a)/n tis a)po\ th=s e(te/ras e)pi\ th
 e(te/ran metaga/goi th
 o)/yin a)pospa/sas: ou) ga e)qe/lei a)fi/stasqai r(a|di/ws, a)ll' e)/nqa a)
 a)perei/sh| to\ prw=ton, tou/tou e)/xetai kai\ to\ paro
 e)painei=: ka)
 e)p' a)/llo metabh=|, ka)kei=no kalo
 o(ra=| kai\ parame/nei, kai\ u(po\ tw=n plhsi/on paralamba/netai. kai\ o(/lws perike/xutai/ moi to\ ka/llos au)tw=n kai\ o(/lon periei/lhfe/ me kai\ a)/xqomai, o(/ti mh\ kai\ au)to\s w(/sper o( *)/argos o(/lw| ble/pein du/namai tw=| sw/mati. dokw= d' a)/n moi kalw=s dika/sai pa/sais a)podou\s to\ mh=lon. kai\ ga au)= kai\ to/de, tau/thn me
 ei)=nai sumbe/bhken
tou= *dio\s a)delfh
 kai\ gunai=ka, tau/tas de\ qugate/ras: pw=s ou)=n ou) xaleph\ kai\ ou(/tws h( kri/sis;

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: ou)k oi)=da: plh\n ou)x; oi(=o/n te a)nadu=nai pro\s tou= *dio\s kekeleusme/non.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p: e(\n tou=to, w)= *(ermh=, pei=son au)ta/s, mh\ xalepw=s e)/xein moi ta\s du/o ta\s nenikhme/nas, a)lla\ mo/nwn tw=n o)fqalmw=n h(gei=sqai th\n diamarti/an.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: ou(/tw fasi\ poih/sein: w(/ra de/ soi h)/dh perai/nein th\n kri/sin.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p: peiraso/meqa: ti/ ga\r a)\n kai\ pa/qoi tis; e)kei=no de\ pro/teron ei)de/nai bou/lomai, po/ter' e)carke/sei skopei=n au)ta\s w(s e)/xousin, h)\ kai\ a)podu=sai deh/sei pro\s to\ a)kribe\s th=s e)ceta/sews;

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
tou=to me
 so
 a)
 ei)/h tou= dikastou=, kai\ pro/statte o(/ph kai\ qe/leis.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p: o(/ph kai\ qe/lw; gumna\s i)dei=n bou/lomai.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: a)po/dute, w)= au(=tai: su\ d' e)pisko/pei: e)gw\ de\ a)pestra/fhn.

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p:
kalw=s, w)= *pa/ri: kai\ prw/th ge a)podu/somai, o(/pws ma/qh|s o(/ti mh\ mo/nas e)/xw ta\s w)le/nas leuka\s
mhde\ tw=| bow=pis ei)=nai me/ga fronw=, e)p' i)/shs de/ ei)mi pa=sa kai\ o(moi/ws kalh/.^

sp.speaker: *)aqh/na
sp.p:
mh\ pro/teron a)podu/sh|s au)th/n, w)= *pa/ri, pri
 a)
 to
 kesto
 a)po/qhtai — farmaki\s ga/r e)stin — mh/ se katagohteu/sh| di' au)tou= kai/toi ge e)xrh=n mhde\ ou(/tw kekallwpisme/nhn parei=nai mhde\ tosau=ta e)ntetrimme/nhn xrw/mata kaqa/per w(s a)lhqw=s e(tai/ran tina/, a)lla\ gumno
 to\ ka/llos e)pideiknu/ein.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p: , *eu)= le/gousi to\ peri\ tou= kestou=, kai\ a)po/qou.

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p:
ti/ ou)=n ou)xi\ kai\ su/, w)= *)aqhna=, th
 ko/run a)felou=sa yilh
 th
 kefalh
 e)pideiknu/eis, a)ll' e)pisei/eis to
 lo/fon kai\ to
 dikasth
 fobei=s; h)\ de/dias mh/ soi e)le/gxhtai to\ glauko
 tw=n o)mma/twn a)/neu tou= foberou= blepo/menon;

sp.speaker: *)aqh/na
sp.p: i)dou/ soi h( ko/rus au(/th a)fh/|rhtai.

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p: i)dou\ kai/ soi o( kesto/s.

sp.speaker: *(/hra
sp.p: a)lla\ a)podusw/meqa.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p:
w)= *zeu= tera/stie th=s qe/as, tou= ka/llous, th=s h(donh=s. oi(/a me
 h( parqe/nos, w(s de\. basiliko
 au(/th kai\ semno
 a)pola/mpei kai\ a)lhqw=s a)/cion tou= *dio/s, h(/de d' o(ra=| h(du/ ti kai\ glafuro/n, kai\ prosagwgo
 e)meidi/asen — a)ll' h)/dh me
 a(/lis e)/xw th=s eu)daimoni/as: ei) dokei= de/, kai\ i)di/a| kaq' e(ka/sthn e)pidei=n bou/lomai, w(s nu=n ge a)mfi/bolo/s ei)mi kai\ ou)k oi)=da pro\s o(/ ti a)poble/yw, pa/nth| ta\s o)/yeis perispw/menos.

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p: ou(/tw poiw=men.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p: a)/pite ou)=n ai( du/o: su\ de/, w)= *(/hra, peri/mene.

sp.speaker: *(/hra
sp.p: perimenw=, ka)peida/n me a)kribw=s i)/dh|s, w(/ra soi kai\ ta)/lla h)/dh skopei=n ei) kala/ soi, ta\ dw=ra th=s yh/fou th=s e)mh=s. h)\n ga/r me, w)= *pa/ri, dika/sh|s ei)=nai kalh/n, a(pa/shs e)/sh| th=s *)asi/as despo/ths.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p:
ou)k e)pi\ dw/rois me
 ta\ h(me/tera. plh
 a)/piqi: pepra/cetai ga a(/per a)
 dokh=|. su\ de\ pro/siqi h( *)aqhna=. '

sp.speaker: *)aqh/na
sp.p:
pare/sthka/ soi, kai\ h)/n me, w)= *pa/ri, dika/sh|s kalh/n, ou)/pote h(/ttwn a)/pei e)k ma/xhs, a)ll' a)ei\
kratw=n polemisth\n ga/r se kai\ nikhfo/ron a)perga/somai.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p:
ou)de/n, w)= *)aqhna=, dei= moi pole/mou kai\ ma/xhs:; ei)rh/nh ga/r, w(s o(ra=|s, ta\ nu=n e)pe/xei th
 *frugi/an te kai\ *ludi/an kai\ a)pole/mhtos h(mi=n h( tou= patro\s a)rxh/. qa/rrei de/: ou) meionekth/seis ga/r, ka)
 mh\ e)pi\ dw/rois dika/zwmen. a)ll' e)/nduqi h)/dh kai\ e)pi/qou th
 ko/run i(kanw=s ga ei)=don. th
 *)afrodi/thn parei=nai kairo/s.

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p:
au(/th soi e)gw\ plhsi/on, kai\ sko/pei kaq' e(
 a)kribw=s mhde
 paratre/xwn, a)ll' e)ndiatri/bwn e(ka/stw| tw=n merw=n. ei) d' e)qe/leis, w)= kale/, kai\ ta/de mou a)/kouson. e)gw\ ga pa/lai o(rw=sa/ se ne/on o)/nta kai\ kalo
 o(poi=on ou)k oi)=da ei)/ tina e(/teron h( *frugi/a tre/fei, makari/zw me
 tou= ka/llous, ai)tiw=mai de\ to\ mh\ a)polipo/nta tou\s skope/lous kai\ tautasi\ ta\s pe/tras kat' a)/stu zh=n, a)lla\ diafqei/rein to\ ka/llos e)n e)rhmi/a|. ti/ me
 ga a)
 su\ a)polau/seias tw=n o)rw=n; ti/ d' a)
 a)po/nainto tou= sou= ka/llous ai( bo/es; e)/prepen de\ h)/dh soi kai\ gegamhke/nai, mh\ me/ntoi a)groi=ko/n tina kai\ xwri=tin, oi(=ai kata\ th
 *)/idhn ai( gunai=kes, a)lla/ tina e)k th=s *(ella/dos, h)\ *)argo/qen h)\ e)k *kori/nqou h)\ *la/kainan oi(/aper h)\ *(ele/nh e)sti/n, ne/a te kai\ kalh\ kai\ kat' ou)de
 e)la/ttwn e)mou=, kai\ to\ dh\ me/giston, e)rwtikh/. e)kei/nh ga ei) kai\ mo/non qea/saito/ se, eu)= oi)=da e)gw\ w(s a(/panta a)polipou=sa kai\ parasxou=sa e(auth
 e)/kdoton e(/yetai kai\ sunoikh/sei. pa/ntws de\ kai\ su\ a)kh/koa/s ti peri\ au)th=s.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p: ou)de/n, w)= *)afrodi/th: nu=n de\ h(de/ws a)\n a)kou/saimi/ sou ta\ pa/nta dihgoume/nhs.

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p: au(/th quga/thr me/n e)sti *lh/das e)kei/nhs th=s kalh=s e)f' h(\n o( *zeu\s kate/pth ku/knos geno/menos.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p: poi/a de\ th\n o)/yin e)sti/;

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p:
leukh\ me/n, oi(/an ei)ko\s e)k ku/knou gegenhme/nhn, a(palh\ de/, w(s e)n w)|w=| trafei=sa, gumna\s ta\ polla\ kai\ palaistikh/, kai\ ou(/tw dh/ ti perispou/dastos w(/ste kai\ po/lemon a)mf' au)th=| gene/sqai, tou= *qhse/ws a)/wron e)/ti a(rpa/santos. ou) mh
 a)ll' e)peidh/per ei)s a)kmh
 kate/sth, pa/ntes oi( a)/ristoi tw=n *)axaiw=n e)pi\ th
 mnhstei/an a)ph/nthsan, proekri/qh de\ *mene/lews tou= *pelopidw=n ge/nous. ei) dh\ qe/lois, e)gw/ soi katapra/comai to
 ga/mon.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p: pw=s fh/s; to\n th=s gegamhme/nhs;

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p: ne/os ei)= su\ kai\ a)groi=kos, e)gw\ de\ oi)=da w(s xrh\ ta\ toiau=ta dra=n.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p: pw=s; e)qe/lw ga\r kai\ au)to\s ei)de/nai.

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p:
su\ me
 a)podhmh/seis w(s e)pi\ qe/an th=s *(ella/dos, ka)peida
 a)fi/kh| ei)s th
 *lakedai/mona, o)/yetai/ se h( *(ele/nh. tou)nteu=qen de\ e)mo
 a)
 ei)/h to\ e)/rgon, o(/pws e)rasqh/setai/ sou kai\ a)kolouqh/sei.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p: tou=to au)to\ kai\ a)/piston ei)=nai/ moi dokei=, to\ a)polipou=san to\n a)/ndra e)qelh=sai barba/rw| kai\ ce/nw| sunekpleu=sai.

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p:
qa/rrei tou/tou ge e(/neka. pai=de ga/r moi e)sto
 du/o kalw/, *(/imeros kai\ *)/erws, tou/tw soi paradw/sw h(gemo/ne th=s o(dou= genhsome/nw: kai\ o( me
 *)/erws o(/los parelqw
 ei)s au)th
 a)nagka/sei th
 gunai=ka e)ra=n, o( d' *(/imeros au)tw=| soi perixuqei\s tou=q' o(/per e)sti/n, i(merto/n te qh/sei kai\ e)ra/smion. kai\ au)th\ de\ sumparou=sa deh/somai kai\ tw=n *xari/twn a)kolouqei=n kai\ ou(/tws a(/pantes au)th
 a)napei/somen.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p:
o(/pws me
 tau=ta xwrh/sei, a)/dhlon, w)= *)afrodi/th: plh
 e)rw= ge h)/dh th=s *(ele/nhs kai\ ou)k oi)=d' o(/pws kai\ o(ra=n au)th
 oi)/omai kai\ ple/w eu)qu\ th=s *(ella/dos kai\ th=| *spa/rth| e)pidhmw= kai\ e)pa/neimi e)/xwn th
 gunai=ka — kai\ a)/xqomai o(/ti mh\ tau=ta h)/dh pa/nta poiw=.

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p:
mh\ 'pro/teron e)rasqh=|s, w)= *pa/ri, pri
 e)me\ th
 promnh/strian kai\ numfagwgo
 a)mei/yasqai th=| kri/sei: pre/poi ga a)
 ka)me\ nikhfo/ron u(mi=n sumparei=nai kai\ e(orta/cein a(/ma kai\ tou\s ga/mous kai\ ta\ e)pini/kia. pa/nta ga e)/nesti/ soi — to
 e)/rwta, to\ ka/llos, to
 ga/mon — toutoui\ tou= mh/lou pri/asqai. '.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p: de/doika mh/ mou a)melh/sh|s meta\ th\n kri/sin.

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p: bou/lei ou)=n e)pomo/somai;

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p: mhdamw=s, a)ll' u(po/sxou pa/lin.

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p:
u(pisxnou=mai dh/ soi th
 *(ele/nhn paradw/sein gunai=ka, kai\ a)kolouqh/sein ge/ soi au)th
 kai\ a)fi/cesqai par' u(ma=s ei)s th
 *)/ilion: kai\ au)th\ pare/somai kai\ sumpra/cw ta\ pa/nta.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p: kai\ to\n *)/erwta kai\ to\n *(/imeron kai\ ta\s *xa/ritas a)/ceis;

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p: qa/rrei, kai\ to\n *po/qon kai\ to\n *(ume/naion e)/ti pro\s tou/tois paralh/yomai.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p: ou)kou=n e)pi\ tou/tois di/dwmi to\ mh=lon e)pi\ tou/tois la/mbane.
